overview: Don’t get stuck with the same old ski movies! This year, Poor Boyz Production and newcomers Push Films presents Not Another Ski Movie. Shot entirely on 16mm film, Not Another Ski Movie features Jon Olsson, Henrik Windstedt, Niklas Karlstrom, Simon Dumont, Lars Veen, Sage Cattabriga-Alosa, Stian Hagen and some of Scandinavia’s finest tearing up the backcountry across the US, Canada and Europe. Check out how it all went down with a second look at this incredible season.
title: Not Another Ski Movie
